text: @ChrisCuomo @NYGovCuomo CNN continues to assign a faux-journalist Cuomo brother to have pillow fights with his bro Governor Cuomo rather than ask him to answer for the blood on his hands from forcing Covid-19 patients into Nursing homes with the most at-risk population in the nation.  Embarrassing.
